text: Fahad Al-Abdulrahman(born 6 April 1995) is a Qatari football player who plays as a left-back for Al-Arabi and for the Qatar national under-23 football team. ==Club career== ===Early career=== Abdulrahman started his youth football career at Aspire Academy. In November 2013, he moved to Belgium side K.A.S. Eupen reserve team. ===Al Sadd SC=== On 1 July 2014, Abdulrahman joined the senior team of Qatari club Al Sadd SC. ====K.A.S. Eupen (loan)==== On 2 July 2014, Abdulrahman was loaned to K.A.S. Eupen in Belgian Second Division. He made his league debut against R.A.E.C. Mons on 30 November 2014. In July 2015, his loan was expended for a one season. in this season he played 16 games as defender and contributed to his team's promotion to Belgian First Division A. On 21 June 2016, K.A.S. Eupen announced that Fahad Al-Abdulrahman stays with K.A.S. Eupen for one season. ==International career== Fahad has represented his country at various age groups. He was a member of Qatar national under-19 football team for 2014 AFC U-19 Championship, and he won the championship. He played in 2015 FIFA U-20 World Cup as Qatar national under-20 football team. == Club career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | continental ! colspan=2 | Other ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
